alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 2:07AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PANOLA...SOUTHERN RUSK AND NORTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Pinehill to near Minden to near New Salem. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Tenaha, Timpson, Beckville, Pinehill, Minden, Mount Enterprise, Reklaw, Gary City, Chapman, Front, Lawsonville, Glenfawn, Fairplay, Midyett, Dotson, Deadwood, Woods, Church Hill, and Laneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
